title: Jan Dam (boxer)
text: Johannes "Jan" Dam (24 November 1905 – 19 December 1985) was a Dutch <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1924%20Summer%20Olympics">1924 Summer Olympics</a>. He was born and died in <a href="Rotterdam">Rotterdam</a>. In 1924 he was eliminated in the second round of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201924%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20welterweight">welterweight class</a> after losing his fight to <a href="Roy%20Ingram">Roy Ingram</a>.
